thread.title: Millions of U.S. workers will see a pay increase in 2024

author: VideoElephant
title: Millions of U.S. workers will see a pay increase in 2024
text: At the start of the new year, 22 states and 43 cities and counties are increasing the hourly minimum wage, benefiting nearly 10 million people. And that doesn't only affect workers at major fast food chains or retail outlets; it also includes people who work at small, locally-owned businesses. spotlight Millions of U.S. workers will see a pay increase in 2024 - VideoElephant - - [0](https://fremonttribune.com/news/nation-world/government-politics/millions-of-u-s-workers-will-see-a-pay-increase-in-2024/article_5504845d-a0d6-5c46-a71b-964ef610d1cc.html?mode=comments) Related to this story Most Popular Maine has removed former President Donald Trump from the state’s presidential primary ballot under the Constitution’s insurrection clause in a… The festive lights and Christmas tree that normally decorate Manger Square were missing, as were the usual throngs of tourists and marching bands.
